short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to help students plan their courses at UM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UM Courses Planner is a Chrome/Edge web extension designed to streamline the process of planning and visualizing University of Manitoba course schedules. The extension extracts course information from the Aurora Student portal and automatically populates a weekly calendar, helping students organize their schedules more efficiently.
